abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column honors life and work of bridge player Joan Levy Gerard, who died at age 77; highlights deal played by her during Closed Westchester Swiss Teams tournament in 1974.
lead_paragraph: Joan Levy Gerard, one of bridge’s top tournament administrators and best ambassadors, died on April 5 in White Plains. She was 77.

headline.main: Joan Levy Gerard at Closed Westchester Swiss Teams

snippet: Joan Levy Gerard, one of bridge’s top tournament administrators and best ambassadors, died on April 5 in White Plains. She was 77....
